item.title: Hack.lu CTF 2021 Web Writeup
item.description: Because there are not many Crypto listed in the "Stock Market", our Cryptotrader Cryptanalyst Mystiz joined us for bounty hunting in Web as well, and we got all Web challenges done this time.

item.title: Hack.lu CTF 2021 Crypto Writeup
item.description: Because there are not many Crypto listed in the "Stock Market", I decided to join our Webb-expert Web-expert Ozetta for bounty hunting in web, and we got all web challenges done this time. The writeup of the web challenges can be found here.
